text: 1. Select the other option in the Select widget. 2. Type a new value in the input box from the modal that pops up. 3. Click the Confirm button to save it. 4. Open the select widget's options and note that the new value has been added. 5. Click the Clear customized options button. 6. Open again the select widget's options and note that the newly added option was removed and only the initial options are displayed. 7. Repeat all the above steps and add a value that already exists in the dropdown. Note that an error message is displayed and the new value does not get added.
